articles.author: Nimi Princewill, Sarah Dean, Larry Madowo
articles.title: ‘Not Trump’s dumping ground’: Outrage over arrival of foreign US deportees in tiny African nation - CNN
articles.description: Across Africa, and in the tiny nation of Eswatini, fury has erupted over the arrival of foreign deportees from the United States, after its government confirmed that migrants described by a Department of Homeland security spokesperson as “depraved monsters” h…
